fullName.jp: アリゼー・ルヴェユール

description.jp: 「暁の血盟」に属するエレゼン族。世界を守って命を落とした賢人ルイゾワの孫であり 双子の兄であるアルフィノと祖父の死の真相を追っていた。当初 他のメンバーと別行動をとっていたが のちに 赤魔道士としての戦い方を身につけ冒険者たちに合流する。
description.gl: An Elezen Scion of the Seventh Dawn, and granddaughter of Louisoix, the sage who gave his life to save the world. Together with her twin brother, Alphinaud, she seeks the truth behind her grandfather's death. Initially operating apart from the Scions, she later joins up with other adventurers as a red mage.

jp.text: 悪いわね……！\n私 デキのいい兄と違って 頭より先に体が動くの
お前が世界を引き裂くなら\n私は それを斬り裂く剣になるッ！
ひとりぼっちじゃないなら 勝てない賭けじゃないわ
自分自身で これを選んだんだから
よくぞ聞いてくれたわ！
なお道を塞ごうというのなら……\n全員まとめて かかってきなさいッ！
……あなたばっかりカッコイイんじゃ ずるいもの

gl.text: My brother was always the clever one、 while my talents lay elsewhere...
If you would dare to stand against us、 to destroy all that we hold dear、 then you shall die by my sword!
I cannot do it alone、 but together...together we can defeat them!
I am not here for House Leveilleur、 nor to walk in Grandfather's shadow.
Oh、 I can swim like a fish.
I pray you let us go in peace!
I can't let you take all the glory、 can I?

desc.en:
[Veraero] use +2

When Quest starts
• Grants [Max BRV Up] for 8 turns

When using [Veraero] 
• Raises BRV based on Attack
• BRV attack hit count becomes 5
• Greatly raises total BRV potency 
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• Triggers an HP attack after use
• Lowers Action Delay

When using [Verstone] 
• Raises BRV based on Attack
• BRV attack hit count becomes 5 
• Tremendously raises total BRV potency 
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• Does not increase turn count
• Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

When using [Enchanted Riposte] 
• BRV attack hit count becomes 3 
• Tremendously raises total BRV potency
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV

After using [Enchanted Redoublement]
• Turns [Veraero], [Verstone] to [Verholy]
　∟ Raises BRV based on Attack
　∟ 6-HIT magic BRV + HP attack
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
　∟ Low Action Delay
　∟ Grants 4 units of [White Mana] (limit 7)
　∟ Turns to [Verstone] after use
　∟ Reverts [Verflare] before using [Enchanted Redoublement]
desc.gl:
Veraero use +2

At start of quest:
 • Self: 8 turns MAX BRV Up I

When using Veraero:
 • Increases BRV based on ATK before BRV attack
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 5; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use
 • Higher turn rate

When using Verstone:
 • Increases BRV based on ATK before BRV attack
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 5; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support

When using Enchanted Riposte:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

After using Enchanted Redoublement:
 • Veraero, Verstone becomes Verholy (increases BRV based on ATK before BRV attack; 6-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; high turn rate; increases special effect White Mana by 4 [limit 7]; becomes Verstone after use; returns Verflare to ability before using Enchanted Redoublement)
